content: a textured facecloth made with 100% cotton yarn in your favourite colour or use up scraps and make it stripey the main body has a dense bobbly exfoliating texture use a hook one size smaller than you normally would to keep the stitches tight make it whatever size you like - mine is 10 square including the border and i had enough yarn left to make a set of four 4 scrubbies make it for yourself or make it for a friend or both love the modifications doris made take a look here - https //www ravelry com/projects/filetstueck/textured-facecloth-2
